publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1084 Lewis Macdonald: Aberdeen Football Club - UEFA Cupâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Aberdeen Football Club on qualifying for the knockout stages of the UEFA Cup; recognises the part played by a capacity Pittodrie Stadium in securing qualification, and looks forward to the future economic benefits of qualification and many more European triumphs at Pittodrie in the years ahead. Supported by: Mary Mulligan*, Nanette Milne*, James Kelly*, John Lamont*, Alasdair Allan*, George Foulkes*, Bob Doris*, Bill Butler*, Nicol Stephen*, Brian Adam*, John Park*
S3M-1084 Aberdeen Football Club - UEFA Cup (lodged on 21 December 2007) Jamie Hepburn*, Jack McConnell*
S3M-1084 Aberdeen Football Club - UEFA Cup (lodged on 21 December 2007) Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-1084 Aberdeen Football Club - UEFA Cup (lodged on 21 December 2007) Hugh Henry*
